attributes.action: Replace 6 weeks summer holidays with school
attributes.additional_details: Children have already had so much time off during 2020 and 2021 and a 6 week break is not needed instead schools should remain open for them to catch up and help vulnerable children back into school
attributes.background: Instead of sending children for 6 week holidays, let them go to school to catch up on lost schooling during covid-19

rejection.details: You may wish to sign this petition calling for the same action: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/566739
